    • isValidTree

      private java.lang.Boolean isValidTree​(PortfolioClass node, PortfolioClass parentNode)
      Utility method to validate that the portfolio structure contains no cycle after the change of the parent node of a portfolio class.
      Parameters:
      node - the current portfolio class
      parentNode - the parent portfolio class
      Returns:
      True if the portfolio structure contains no cycle;
      False otherwise;
